targets.query:
from(bucket: "${ndpid_db_name}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "events" and
    (r._field == "packet_count" or
     r._field == "packet_flow_count")
  )

from(bucket: "${ndpid_db_name}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "events" and
    (r._field == "flow_detected_count" or
     r._field == "flow_detection_update_count" or
     r._field == "flow_guessed_count")
  )

from(bucket: "${ndpid_db_name}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "general" and
    (r._field == "flow_src_total_bytes" or
     r._field == "flow_dst_total_bytes" or
     r._field == "json_bytes")
  )

from(bucket: "${ndpid_db_name}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "general" and
    (r._field == "flow_src_total_bytes" or
     r._field == "flow_dst_total_bytes" or
     r._field == "json_bytes")
  )

from(bucket: "${ndpid_db_name}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "general" and
    (r._field == "flow_src_total_bytes" or
     r._field == "flow_dst_total_bytes")
  )

from(bucket: "${ndpid_db_name}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "detection" and
    (r._field == "flow_detected_count" or
     r._field == "flow_guessed_count" or
     r._field == "flow_not_detected_count")
  )

from(bucket: "${ndpid_db_name}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "detection" and
    (r._field == "flow_detected_count" or
     r._field == "flow_guessed_count" or
     r._field == "flow_not_detected_count")
  )
